product_name: AlpineAire Foods Pepper Beef with Rice - 2 Servings
long_description: The AlpineAire Foods Pepper Beef with Rice hits your taste buds and satisfies your appetite with 2 servings of beef, red and green bell peppers, seasoned rice and a light black pepper sauce.
short_description: The AlpineAire Foods Pepper Beef with Rice hits your taste buds and satisfies your appetite with 2 servings of beef, red and green bell peppers, seasoned rice and a light black pepper sauce.
